name: pekoe
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a good-quality black tea made from the young leaves of the tea plant: The leaves of this tea are slightly larger than pekoe. The beer is infused with Pekoe and Earl Grey teas. See also
orange pekoe
More examplesFewer examplesThey suggested that drinking certain types of teas - black, green, and pekoe - may help to fight off infection. Tannic acid is found in commercial black and pekoe teas as well as in coffee and cola, chocolate, and red wine. He had been a tea-merchant, but had tired of pekoe and souchong.
